SELECT c.*,cs.lower_num,cs.hight_num,ct.type_name,ac.county_name,city.city_name,province.province_name, city.city_id,province.province_id FROM hp_company c left join hp_company_scale cs on c.hp_company_scale_id = cs.hp_company_scale_id left join hp_company_type ct on ct.hp_company_type_id = c.hp_company_type_id left join hp_area_county ac on c.county_id = ac.county_id left join hp_area_city city on ac.city_id = city.city_id left join hp_area_province province on province.province_id = city.province_id
WHERE 1=1 AND com_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{comName},'%') AND c.create_time >=#{startTime} AND c.create_time <=#{endTime} ORDER BY create_time desc
